mapper.select: select * from p10_casee left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id where p10_casee.del_flag = 0 and p10_casee.casee_type = #{caseeType} and p10_project_casee_re.project_id = #{projectId} order by p10_casee.start_time desc LIMIT 1

select p10_project.company_code,p10_casee.*,p10_casee_lawyer_re.actual_name as lawyerName,p10_court.court_name,p10_project_casee_re.actual_name as userName from p10_casee left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_project_casee_re.project_id left join p10_casee_lawyer_re on p10_casee_lawyer_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_court on p10_court.court_id = p10_casee.court_id where p10_casee.del_flag = 0
and (p10_project.company_code like concat('%', #{query.caseeNumber}, '%') or p10_casee.casee_number like concat('%', #{query.caseeNumber}, '%'))
and p10_casee.executed_name like concat('%', #{query.executedName}, '%')
and p10_project_casee_re.actual_name like concat('%', #{query.actualName}, '%')
and p10_casee.casee_type = #{query.caseeType}
AND p10_casee.start_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
ORDER BY p10_casee.status asc,p10_casee.start_time desc

select p10_project.company_code,p10_casee.*,p10_casee_lawyer_re.actual_name as lawyerName,p10_court.court_name,p10_project_casee_re.actual_name as userName from p10_casee left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_project_casee_re.project_id left join p10_casee_lawyer_re on p10_casee_lawyer_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_court on p10_court.court_id = p10_casee.court_id where p10_casee.del_flag = 0 and p10_casee.casee_id = #{caseeId}

SELECT p10_subject.*, p10_casee_subject_re.type FROM p10_casee_subject_re LEFT JOIN p10_subject ON p10_casee_subject_re.subject_id = p10_subject.subject_id AND p10_subject.del_flag = 0 WHERE p10_casee_subject_re.del_flag = 0 AND p10_casee_subject_re.casee_id = #{query.caseeId}
